title: New Research Shows Insider Trading Is Everywhere
itunes:title: New Research Shows Insider Trading Is Everywhere
description:
Dr. Amy Compton-Phillips, President of Clinical Care at Providence Health System, discusses how the pandemic and vaccines are impacting pregnant women. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Liam Vaughan share Liam's Businessweek cover story Insiders’ Winning Trades Are So Good They Have Online Followers. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Matt Day explains what the Amazon Astro Robot does. And we Drive to the Close with James Cakmak, Technology Analyst at Clockwise Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
